name: Medabots: Rokusho
description:
Kids everywhere are losing their prized Medabot Medals and Medaparts to
a diabolical team of warped Medamaniacs. Join Ikki and his friends as
they track down the source of the trouble and beat the Rubberobos at
their own game! Completely customize your Medabots from tons of
different Medaparts to prepare for intense Robattles!
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
